Class DockerRepository

java.lang.Object
com.github.cowwoc.digitalocean.resource.DockerRepository
public final class DockerRepository extends Object
A repository of docker images.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    deleteDanglingImages()
    Deletes all dangling (untagged) images in the registry.

    Returns the fully qualified name of the repository (e.g., registry.digitalocean.com/nasa/rocket-ship).

    Looks up a docker image by its tag.

    Returns the images in the repository.
    String
    getName()
    Returns the repository's name.

    • getImages

      public List<DockerImage> getImages() throws IOException, TimeoutException, InterruptedException
      Returns the images in the repository.
      Returns:
      the images
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the client is closed
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs. These errors are typically transient, and retrying the request may resolve the issue.
      TimeoutException - if the request times out before receiving a response. This might indicate network latency or server overload.
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted while waiting for a response. This can happen due to shutdown signals.

    • deleteDanglingImages

      public void deleteDanglingImages() throws IOException, TimeoutException, InterruptedException
      Deletes all dangling (untagged) images in the registry.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs. These errors are typically transient, and retrying the request may resolve the issue.
      TimeoutException - if the request times out before receiving a response. This might indicate network latency or server overload.
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted while waiting for a response. This can happen due to shutdown signals.

    • getImageByTags

      public DockerImage getImageByTags(Set<String> tags) throws IOException, TimeoutException, InterruptedException
      Looks up a docker image by its tag.
      Parameters:
      tags - the image's tags
      Returns:
      null if no match was found
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if tags is null
      IllegalArgumentException - if any of the tags contain leading or trailing whitespace or are empty
      IllegalStateException - if the client is closed
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs. These errors are typically transient, and retrying the request may resolve the issue.
      TimeoutException - if the request times out before receiving a response. This might indicate network latency or server overload.
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted while waiting for a response. This can happen due to shutdown signals.
